ua.pp.ihorzak.alog

Class ALogConfiguration.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ua.pp.ihorzak.alog.ALogConfiguration.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    ALogConfiguration

    public static class ALogConfiguration.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder to create configured ALogConfiguration instance.

    • Method Detail

      • enabled

        public ALogConfiguration.Builder enabled(boolean isEnabled)
        Enables/disables logging. If set to false all logging calls will be ignored. It is useful for disabling logging in release builds (if not using ProGuard to remove ALog calls). If not called by default logging is enabled.
        Parameters:
        isEnabled - true if logging should be enabled, otherwise false.
        Returns:
        This builder instance.

      • minimalLevel

        public ALogConfiguration.Builder minimalLevel(ALogLevel minimalLevel)
        Sets minimal logging level which should be processed. Log calls with lower logging level than specified will be ignored. If not called by default minimal logging level is set to ALogLevel.VERBOSE.
        Parameters:
        minimalLevel - Minimal logging level which should be precessed. See ALogLevel.
        Returns:
        This builder instance.

      • jsonLevel

        public ALogConfiguration.Builder jsonLevel(ALogLevel jsonLevel)
        Sets logging level for ALog.json(String) calls. Later JSON can be logged with different logging level via ALog.json(ALogLevel, String) calls. If not called by default JSON logging level is set to ALogLevel.INFO.
        Parameters:
        jsonLevel - Logging level for ALog.json(String) calls. See ALogLevel.
        Returns:
        This builder instance.

      • xmlLevel

        public ALogConfiguration.Builder xmlLevel(ALogLevel xmlLevel)
        Sets logging level for ALog.xml(String) calls. Later XML can be logged with different logging level via ALog.xml(ALogLevel, String) calls. If not called by default XML logging level is set to ALogLevel.INFO.
        Parameters:
        xmlLevel - Logging level for ALog.xml(String) calls. See ALogLevel.
        Returns:
        This builder instance.

      • hexLevel

        public ALogConfiguration.Builder hexLevel(ALogLevel hexLevel)
        Sets logging level for ALog.hex(byte[]) calls. Later hexadecimal formatted bytes can be logged with different logging level via ALog.hex(ALogLevel, byte[]) calls. If not called by default hexadecimal formatted bytes logging level is set to ALogLevel.INFO.
        Parameters:
        hexLevel - Logging level for ALog.hex(byte[]) calls. See ALogLevel.
        Returns:
        This builder instance.

      • tag

        public ALogConfiguration.Builder tag(java.lang.String tag)
        Sets default tag for log messages. Later messages can be logged with different tag by using ALogger instance got from ALog.t(String) or ALog.tst(String, int). If tag is set to null, the name of class where logging method called is used. If this method is not called by default tag is set to null.
        Parameters:
        tag - Default tag for log messages.
        Returns:
        This builder instance.

      • threadPrefixEnabled

        public ALogConfiguration.Builder threadPrefixEnabled(boolean isThreadPrefixEnabled)
        Enables/disables thread name in message prefix. If not called by default this option is enabled.
        Parameters:
        isThreadPrefixEnabled - true if logging message prefix should contain thread name of logging method call location, otherwise false.
        Returns:
        This builder instance.

      • classPrefixEnabled

        public ALogConfiguration.Builder classPrefixEnabled(boolean isClassPrefixEnabled)
        Enables/disables location class name in message prefix. If not called by default this option is disabled.
        Parameters:
        isClassPrefixEnabled - true if logging message prefix should contain class name of logging method call location, otherwise false.
        Returns:
        This builder instance.

      • methodPrefixEnabled

        public ALogConfiguration.Builder methodPrefixEnabled(boolean isMethodPrefixEnabled)
        Enables/disables location method name in message prefix. If not called by default this option is enabled.
        Parameters:
        isMethodPrefixEnabled - true if logging message prefix should contain method name of logging method call location, otherwise false.
        Returns:
        This builder instance.

      • lineLocationPrefixEnabled

        public ALogConfiguration.Builder lineLocationPrefixEnabled(boolean isLineLocationPrefixEnabled)
        Enables/disables logging call location in message prefix. If not called by default this option is enabled.
        Parameters:
        isLineLocationPrefixEnabled - true if logging message prefix should contain logging method call location, otherwise false.
        Returns:
        This builder instance.

      • stackTraceLineCount

        public ALogConfiguration.Builder stackTraceLineCount(int stackTraceLineCount)
        Sets the count of stack trace lines to output with logging message. If not called by default this option is set to 0.
        Parameters:
        stackTraceLineCount - Count of stack trace lines to output with logging message.
        Returns:
        This builder instance.

      • jsonIndentSpaceCount

        public ALogConfiguration.Builder jsonIndentSpaceCount(int jsonIndentSpaceCount)
        Sets the count of indent space count for ALog.json(ALogLevel, String) and ALog.json(String) log messages.
        Parameters:
        jsonIndentSpaceCount - Indent space count for ALog.json(ALogLevel, String) and ALog.json(String) log messages.
        Returns:
        This builder instance.

      • xmlIndentSpaceCount

        public ALogConfiguration.Builder xmlIndentSpaceCount(int xmlIndentSpaceCount)
        Sets the count of indent space count for ALog.xml(ALogLevel, String) and ALog.xml(String) log messages.
        Parameters:
        xmlIndentSpaceCount - Indent space count for ALog.xml(ALogLevel, String) and ALog.xml(String) log messages.
        Returns:
        This builder instance.

      • arrayFormatterEnabled

        public ALogConfiguration.Builder arrayFormatterEnabled(boolean isArrayFormatterEnabled)
        Enables/disables custom formatting for arrays. If not called by default this option is enabled.
        Parameters:
        isArrayFormatterEnabled - true if custom arrays formatting should be enabled, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        This builder instance.

      • collectionFormatterEnabled

        public ALogConfiguration.Builder collectionFormatterEnabled(boolean isCollectionFormatterEnabled)
        Enables/disables custom formatting for collections. If not called by default this option is enabled.
        Parameters:
        isCollectionFormatterEnabled - true if custom collections formatting should be enabled, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        This builder instance.

      • mapFormatterEnabled

        public ALogConfiguration.Builder mapFormatterEnabled(boolean isMapFormatterEnabled)
        Enables/disables custom formatting for maps. If not called by default this option is enabled.
        Parameters:
        isMapFormatterEnabled - true if custom maps formatting should be enabled, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        This builder instance.

      • formatter

        public ALogConfiguration.Builder formatter(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                           ALogFormatter<?> formatter)
        Adds custom class instances logging formatter. Custom formatters are prohibited for primitive classes, primitive class wrappers, arrays, collections and maps.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class instances of which should be formatted with passed logging formatter.
        formatter - Custom logging formatter.
        Returns:
        This builder instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If passed class is primitive class, primitive class wrapper, array, collection or map.

      • build

        public ALogConfiguration build()
        Builds new ALogConfiguration instance with set to this builder instance parameters.
        Returns:
        New ALogConfiguration instance.
